original_text: So the five men continued on their journey. They arrived at Laish. They saw that it was a safe place to live. The people of Laish were not afraid of any trouble. They lived in peace, like the Sidonians do. Their land gave them everything that they needed, so they were rich. They lived a long way from the Sidonians, and there were no other people who would help them.
korean_text: 이에 다섯 사람이 떠나 라이스에 이르러 거기 있는 백성을 본즉 염려 없이 거주하며 시돈 사람들이 사는 것처럼 평온하며 안전하니 그 땅에는 부족한 것이 없으며 부를 누리며 시돈 사람들과 거리가 멀고 어떤 사람과도 상종하지 아니함이라

sentences.original_text: So the five men continued on their journey.
They saw that it was a safe place to live.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그곳이 살기에 안전한 곳임을 보았습니다.

sentences.original_text: The people of Laish were not afraid of any trouble.
sentences.korean_translation: 라이스 사람들은 어떤 어려움도 두려워하지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: They lived in peace, like the Sidonians do.
Their land gave them everything that they needed.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 땅은 그들에게 필요한 모든 것을 주었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They lived a long way from the Sidonians,
and there were no other people who would help them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들을 도와줄 다른 사람들이 없었습니다.
